scripts.gcloud:config: gcloud config set project unicorn-hal && gcloud auth configure-docker && gcloud auth configure-docker asia-northeast1-docker.pkg.dev
scripts.gcloud:activate: gcloud auth activate-service-account --key-file ./scripts/utils/runner.json && gcloud config set account runner@unicorn-hal.iam.gserviceaccount.com && gcloud auth list
scripts.gcloud:deploy: gcloud run deploy unicorn-notification-server --image gcr.io/unicorn-hal/unicorn-notification-server --platform managed --region asia-northeast1 --allow-unauthenticated
scripts.auth: npm run gcloud:config && npm run gcloud:activate
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run docker:build:cloud && npm run docker:push && npm run gcloud:deploy
